name: Sunset Hills
summary: The player takes on the role of Nico, who travels by train to each city to visit his former comrades, encountering a variety of people and events on the journey, and gradually learning about different life through solving assorted puzzles along the way. As they reunite, they recall their past experiences in the war, unravelling the war and Nico’s past, and gradually revealing the true purpose of Nico’s journey.
